meanings.definition: The process of becoming less bright or intense.
meanings.sent1: The fadings of the sunset painted the sky in soft pastel colors.
meanings.sent2: The fadings of the stars signaled the arrival of dawn.
meanings.sent3: As the light bulb flickered, its fadings created a disco party effect.
meanings.sent4: The fadings of her smile mirrored the waning happiness in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The fadings of the music left a lingering sense of melancholy in the room.

meanings.sent1: The fadings of the mist revealed a hidden mountain peak.
meanings.sent2: The fadings of the ghostly figure left the room in silence.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the fadings of a coin into thin air.
meanings.sent4: The fadings of the footprints puzzled the detective investigating the case.
meanings.sent5: The fadings of the memories slowly faded into oblivion.

meanings.definition: A temporary fashion, notion, or activity.
meanings.sent1: The fadings of the trend left the fashion industry searching for the next big thing.
meanings.sent2: The fadings of the viral video were soon replaced by a new internet sensation.
meanings.sent3: The fadings of the silly dance craze made everyone laugh at their own awkward moves.
meanings.sent4: The fadings of the diet fad left many disappointed with no lasting results.
meanings.sent5: The fadings of the toy's popularity led to shelves full of discounted items.
